genresAdvancedInfo.name: early romantic era
genresAdvancedInfo.description: The early romantic era in classical music was a period of intense emotion and individual expression. Composers such as Beethoven, Schumann, and Chopin wrote music that was deeply personal and often reflected their own struggles and triumphs. The music was characterized by lush harmonies, sweeping melodies, and a focus on the individual voice.

index.head-title: Spotify Top artists and songs - Stats about your music on Spotify

index.what-is-spotify-top-content: The {strongOpen}easiest{strongClose} way to get stats about your listening history on Spotify. Find out and share your {strongOpen}top artists{strongClose}, {strongOpen}tracks{strongClose}, and {strongOpen}genres{strongClose}.
